title.rendered: Marketing Trends & Thought Leadership For Agencies with Jay Baer

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1508963945093{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #666468 url(http://sharpspring.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/single-resource-page-1902×496.png?id=158417) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1588184831744{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Marketing Trends & Thought Leadership For Agencies

Webinar with Marketing Guru Jay Baer

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs” el_id=”passedEvent-column” el_class=”hidden”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
4 Big Reasons Your Agency Must Implement Marketing Automation
[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

To say that there’s information overload in today’s marketing world is an understatement. It’s impossible to sift through it all and even more difficult to determine which resources are worth your time. So what do other agencies read, watch and listen to? Who do they trust?

SharpSpring partnered with Jay Baer, founder of Convince & Convert and New York Times best-selling author, to survey agencies about where they look to stay educated and informed. During this short webinar, Jay presents the key findings and gives you great ways to build and refine your personal reading/listening/watching list!

[/vc_column_text]

Your Host

Jay Baer

Founder, Convince & Convert (And 4 Other Agencies)

Jay is a hype-free digital marketing and customer service strategist, speaker, New York Times best-selling author of six books, and a technology investor. He founded Convince & Convert in 2008, and it is his fifth multi-million dollar venture. Jay’s Social Pros show was named Best Marketing Podcast in the Content Marketing Awards. He’s also the most retweeted person in the world among digital marketers, and one of the top 3 most influential people online among CMOs and B2B Marketers. At Convince & Convert, he oversees big picture strategy while educating and informing businesspeople on stage and on the page.read more...

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274338786{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
